thread.title: Fire and smoke possible at Logan during exercises - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Fire and smoke possible at Logan during exercises - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Fire and smoke possible at Logan during exercises - Massachusetts news
text:
Emergency training exercises are underway at Boston’s Logan International Airport, and smoke may be seen coming from the airport during the drills.
Massport made the announcement Wednesday morning on its Logan Airport Twitter account.
 BOS Safety Advisory: Training exercises to be conducted on the airfield today from 9AM-1PM. Fire & smoke may be visible.
— Boston Logan Airport (@BostonLogan) October 14, 2015 Massport conducts emergency drills at the airport several times per year.
